author: aconway
msg: General-purpose producer-consumer synchronization. Anywhere we have
producer/consumer threads in qpid we should re-use this sync object
rather than re-inventing the synchronization each time.
self contained in-process client + broker convenience for tests.

author: ritchiem
msg: QPID-368 Revised. Had the wrong logging level set on an log statement

author: ritchiem
msg: QPID-368 Added the first data body to the list when creating it. included test case.
